TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicy extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 类表示服务器用来验证传入客户端连接的扩展保护策略。

span.span: The class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开类的任何类 都不应允许设置空策略，应提供默认策略，或者需要由应用程序开发人员或管理员创建和设置显式策略。Any classes that expose the class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.

related.span: 带有扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证

span.span: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性表示用于验证的自定义通道绑定令牌。This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation. 这适用于自定义外部通道提供 CBT 的高级方案。This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel. 示例方案可能将此属性与和结合使用 。An example scenario might use this property in combination with and .

summary.span: 获取用于与客户端的 SPN 相匹配的自定义服务提供程序名称 (SPN) 列表。

span.span: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.

value.span: 包含用于与客户端的 SPN 相匹配的自定义 SPN 列表。

span.span: A that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性指示用于与客户端的 SPN 进行匹配的自定义 SPN 列表。This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN. 默认情况下，服务器将根据其注册终结点确定默认 SPN 列表。By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints. 对于需要 SPN 检查的方案，可以使用构造函数来指定此属性，以便重写用于与客户端的 SPN 进行匹配的默认列表。For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client's SPN.

related.span: 带有扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证

span.span: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OSSupportsExtendedProtection As Boolean
public: static property bool OSSupportsExtendedProtection { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示操作系统是否支持带扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证。

span.span: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.

value.span: 如果操作系统支持带扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持扩展保护的更改当前适用于 Windows 7 和 Windows Server 2008 R2 上的应用程序。The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. 扩展保护功能将作为 Windows Vista 和 Windows Server 2008 的更新提供。The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008. 扩展保护功能不可用于 Windows 的早期版本。The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.
